results.deck: CDV Software Entertainment AG is a German publisher of PC games, headquartered in Bruchsal, Germany. They have published a wide variety of games, though they specialize in strategy games. Notable releases include games in the Sacred, Blitzkrieg and Sudden Strike series, all of which have garnered large fanbases in Europe.
results.name: CDV Software Entertainment AG

game.name: Combat Mission II: Barbarossa to Berlin
No Surrender: Battle of the Bulge
Wet Attack: The Empire Cums Back

concept.name: Defend X for Y Amount of Time
